data.title: Lionel Messi
data.text:
_Lionel Messi was born in Rosario, in Santa Fe province (northeastern Argentina). Very young, he does wonders with the ball among his peers. Thus, at the age of 5 years, his grandmother took him take tests in the local club, Grandoli where pibe playing against kids 12 years. Boosted by his talent, he is found later in the prestigious club Newell's Old Boys. Splashing matches his natural talent, comparisons start. His impressive performances and earned him juggling demonstrations of the very young compared to the national idol Diego Maradona.

At 12, Messi is only 1.11 meters and a doctor detects a hormonal disease at the kid. The professional career of the young Leo sees himself more than ever compromised. In addition, Newell's president refuses to pay for treatment that would allow Messi to catch up growth and his parents have not the means of such medicine. At 13 Messi then crosses the Atlantic to try his luck in Barcelona.

After a successful trial, La Masia, the training center of Barcelona, ​​supports the medical care of the Argentine who moved to Catalonia in 2000 with his family. But Lionel Messi is not the end of his troubles. In his second game with the Infantil B (the Barca youth team), he fractured his fibula and becomes unavailable for three months. In 2001, it is a dispute with his former club the land away from February to June Upon his return to the field, his talent is not lost: he connects the goals and dribbles crazy. After changing a record through the ranks of the club, Messi is convened for the first time against Espanyol Barcelona. We then October 16, 2004. The youngster will not wait long to delight fans. Indeed, against Albacete, Lionel Messi returns to the club's history with his first goal with a clever ball stung. At 17 years 10 months and 7 days, it simply becomes the youngest player to score for Barçaarcelone during a match Liga.e and planetary legend Maradona.

In 2005, Barcelona renewed his contract with the same termination clause that Ronaldinho (€ 150m).

The 2005-06 season was one of its explosion as a team player first, after a great start in the Joan Gamper Trophy against Juventus, March 10, 2007, for the umpteenth time he splashes the match of his talent and marvel the football fans. Indeed, when the Clasico between Barcelona to Real Madrid, he saves his club with a hat-trick that allows Barça to 10 against 11, to snatch the 3-3 draw against his rival.

April 18, 2007, during the semi-final of the Spanish Cup against Getafe CF, he scores a goal of extraterrestrial: starting his own camp he dribbles six opposing players (including goalkeeper) before to slide the ball into the net. A goal worthy of that scored by Diego Maradona in the 1986 World Team against England.

He repeated a feat Maradonesque June 9, 2007 when Catalan derby against Espanyol Barcelona (2-2), scoring of the hand during the penultimate day of the championship. After "Hand of God", this gesture was named "Hand of Messi". To this end we recall the goal scored by hand by Diego Maradona in the 1986 World against England.

_Since the beginning of the 2007-2008 season, Lionel Messi is one of the main custodians of the game for the Catalans and is marked by as splendid qu'innatendus goals making him the most fantastic "Fantastic 4" of Barca and the One of the serious candidates to Golden Ball.

Some delegates from the Spanish Royal Federation of Football did not wait long to realize the immense talent of Messi, offering him the opportunity to represent his adopted country in the junior category. But the Argentinian origins are deeply rooted in him and he politely refuses this proposal in the hope that one day he will be part of Albiceleste. That dream becomes reality when it is selected in the Argentine team of under 20 to compete for playoff games in Colombia, with a view to qualifying for the Junior World Championship Cup in 2005. In addition to winning the ultimate title, Messi is top scorer and was named best player of the tournament. This has allowed Messi to make known his talent at the international level, only 18 years to prove he had the greatest potential. Amazing with the ball, it is especially at this time he proved. Soon after, the integra Messi A selection in a friendly against Hungary has. The popular enthusiasm, Argentina, around this "Pocket Player" to appeal to the elusive dribbling superlatives. Regularly compared to the national idol and legend planetary Maradona.
